title: "Microsoft Rolls Out 'Improved' Voice Access on Windows 11 Following Removal of Windows Speech Recognition"
excerpt: "With AI integration, Microsoft has the upper hand to improve Copilot and other AI-related features on Windows 11. This would also position Voice Access as a central component in the evolving Windows 11 interface, making it more useful to regular users and those with mobility disabilities."
